name: Shrimp with Spicy Tomato Sauce
author: ARTFIEND
summary: This recipe is very simple and a real all-around favorite. It even tastes great the next day, that is, if you have leftovers! Serve over pasta or rice with a bottle of red wine and some crusty bread for a fantastic and impressive dinner.
ingredients: 2 pounds medium shrimp - peeled and deveined
directions: In a large skillet over medium heat, cook the garlic in the olive oil until just golden, approximately 2 minutes
Be careful not to burn the garlic
Add the tomatoes and sprinkle with salt and cayenne pepper
Bring to a gentle simmer and cook, stirring occasionally, for 15 minutes
Season the shrimp with salt and add to the tomatoes
Cook 3 to 5 minutes, or until no longer pink
Stir in 1 tablespoon of butter for added richness, if desired
